name: Astral Chestplate
data: It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It decreases the users wisdom a bit.
It increases the users intelligence a good amount.
It has superb armour class for its type (nice in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
